main event: An object shaped like a disk was observed hovering at an altitude of 2,000 feet in Kent, Ohio on 27 August 1956.
interesting points: The object was approximately 40-50 feet in diameter.,The observation lasted for 2 minutes.,The object was traveling in a southwesterly direction.,Ground-radar and air-visual sensors were used during the observation.,There is a low probability of the object being an aircraft or balloon.
witness description: Terry Beal, 14 years old, located in Kent, Ohio; T/SGT Henry H.Y. Lee, involved in the Air Force.
